values.name: Jo Offer Creative Services
values.description:
My own art practice combines the use of digital skills with hand-rendered type, pattern, collage and print-making to create illustrative images and graphic design solutions for a broad range of clients.

Commissions include Brighton & Hove Council, Brighton & Hove Primary Care trust, Brighton & Hove buses and Simon Carter Accessories. 

Visualisation of ideas and concepts
Storyboarding and narrative illustration
Characterisation
Brand development and application.
Print pricing and production

values.name: Max Crisfield
values.description: Max Crisfield is a freelance writer/editor with over 15 years experience as a manager in publishing and the arts. He started out in the publishing sector with Penguin Books before embarking on a successful arts marketing career, including marketing manager of the largest multi-arts festival in England, Brighton Festival. Since 2003, he has worked as a freelance writer and copy-editor, specialising in the arts and culture sectors. He is a qualified copy-editor (accredited by the Publishing Training Centre at Book House), with a first-class BA in English and History and an MA in English Literature.  His clients include: Brighton Festival, NESTA, Book Trust, Dublin Writers Festival, ZAP Arts, The Arts Depot, Frances Lincoln Publishing, and London Sinfonietta Orchestra. He also runs Brighton's annual big read project, City Reads

Our vision is to create a society in which the most vulnerable people are valued and have the opportunity to achieve quality of life and well-being. 

Impetus uses volunteers and volunteering as a way to provides direct support services to local people experiencing disability and/or disadvantage. We currently work primarily with older people and adults with learning disability providing befriending services, advocacy, and representation on issues relating to health and wellbeing. 

We also provide infrastructure support to organisations within the voluntary sector through the Volunteer Centre and the Performance Development Service.

values: Mentoring & befriending services for older people
Advocacy & support for people with learning difficulties
Representation & voice on health & wellbeing issues

values.name: Brighton & Hove Impetus
Billy's PA Hire (Brighton)
values.description: PA and soundsystem hire with free delivery, set up and collection around Brighton and Sussex.

Brighton Ventures is a privately held consulting firm specializing in assisting businesses of all size explore the options of expanding internationally.  

In today's world of financial uncertainty, it is important for businesses to have a clear idea of what stability involves for their company. One concept that more and more businesses are exploring is one of taking their business to a global level.  In a virtually borderless world, many companies need to compete on a global level in order to succeed.
values.name: Brighton Ventures, LLC

values.description:
When you join the Brighton & Hove Chamber of Commerce you become part of one of the City’s most effective business groups, and by joining you add another business with which others can engage. You can share your knowledge and expertise, and in turn you get access to a new business network from which you can benefit. 

What does the Chamber do?
The Chamber is the voice of the City’s business people, and it’s a voice that really helps its members build successful businesses. We have a reputation for providing high-quality networking opportunities and delivering a wide-ranging syllabus of inspirational advice and effective training.

As well as helping local businesses to grow and prosper, we represent our members on the larger political and economic stage too, working closely with local agencies, including the Council, on issues like business legislation, building programmes and regional transport.
values.name: Brighton and Hove Chamber of Commerce
Meaning Conference
values.description:
Meaning conference is the annual gathering for people who believe business can and must be better in the 21st century.

The purpose of Meaning is to build awareness and community around the practical possibilities of progressive business so that the world becomes a better place.

Our speakers are international thinkers and doers from business, academia and activism, each bringing their view of the challenges and opportunities available to us.

The first Meaning conference happened in Brighton, UK on 01 October 2012. It was attended by over 250 people from UK, Netherlands, Australia and beyond. 

Meaning is curated with love by NixonMcInnes, a social business consultancy based in Brighton.

Welcome to Knill James

Knill James is a modern and progressive firm of accountants, providing services to businesses in the Brighton and Lewes area and throughout the South East.

A long established and highly respected partnership founded in 1887, we provide a concentrated central source of financial expertise for individuals, owner managed businesses, both large and small and professional practices in Brighton, Sussex and the surrounding area all provided with a personal touch that is hard to match.

At Knill James our aim is to provide you with all the financial advice you require to make the very best of your finances.

We take care of core accountancy needs, such as audit, tax and payroll, as well as providing the kind of specialist services that are often difficult to find under one roof.  Beyond that, we have the experience and skills to help you and your team your quest for business growth and development to build a sustainable and successful future.

Our specialist sector teams provide professional support to:
Charities/Not for Profits; Schools and Academies; Agriculture, Food & Drink; Health & Care; Legal Professionals & Practices; Manufacturing; Mumpreneurs; Property & Construction

Our experienced teams provide expert advice to individuals and businesses based in Sussex, Brighton, and the South of England on key areas including financial accounting, company tax, tax planning, payroll, corporate finance, business strategy, management accounts and audit assurance.
values.name: Knill James

values.description: Altitude Volvo Cars Brighton is Australia's newest Volvo retailer.  Our contemporary boutique sales environment will showcase the entire Volvo model range which will ensure your visit will be a relaxed and enjoyable experience.  For more information please see our website or contact us via info@altitudevolvocars.com.au
values.name: Altitude Volvo Cars Brighton
Brighton Print and Media House
values.description:
Brighton Print and Media House, one of the UK’s leading print, design and media companies.

If you’ve not used us before, pick up the phone and talk to us – you’ll find us to be friendly, straight talking and professional.

Our prices for print and design are among the most competitive in the south east.

Combined with our true focus on customer service, we can promise that our lower prices do not compromise on our ability to deliver a quality product - on time, all the time.

Please feel free to call us anytime if you have any questions - we'd be very happy to help you!

Many thanks from the BPMH team.

values.name: Brighton Food Co-Op
values.description:
Brighton Food Co·op (BFC) is a non-profit cooperative buying club owned and run by and for its members. Membership is open to anyone, regardless of race, religious affiliation, political persuasion, etc. In fact, membership is limited in only two ways:

1)  For manageability, the size of the co·op is limited to about 60 families. 
2)  Members must be willing to work cooperatively for the benefit of the co·op. 

BFC buys food and other products in bulk or large lots from United Natural Foods Inc. (UNFI), Frontier Co·op, and various other suppliers then distributes them to its members. In effect, members exchange their distribution labor for cost savings on the products (i.e. prices close to wholesale).

values.name: Noisy Communications
values.description:
Noisy Communications is a Brighton based integrated PR, communications and social media agency run by Helen Jones who has more than 15 years experience in PR and communications initially gained in financial services and most recently spent nurturing and loving video games and bringing them to the masses. 

At Noisy, we want to do things differently, we want to be part of your team so if you'd like us to come and sit in your office, work in your restaurant or sell your products we will (but we won't be offended if you don't).  We'll do anything to understand you better.  We believe that to be effective we must really live your business objectives otherwise we're just that additional expense coming off your bottom line.  And we want to help you increase your profits.

Services include; public relations; events; social media marketing; strategy and planning and marketing for video game self-publishers

We're also passionate about supporting our local industries, especially game developers and digital businesses in Brighton .

So if you need a bit of help or a lot of help, we can help. Our services are flexible and designed to suit you on a hourly, weekly, monthly, project or retainer basis - we can find a relationship that suits your needs.

values.name: Furry Friends Pet Services
values.description:
Furry Friends Pet Services provide friendly, professional and reliable dog walking, dog day care, dog boarding and pet feeding service in and arond Brighton and Hove, Sussex, England.

Furry Friends Pet Services is a Brighton-based family business run by owners (and lifelong animal lovers) Sam and Billie-Jo since 2007.

Having tried to juggle pet care for our own dog for many years whilst working out of town, we understand how important it is to know that your beloved furry family member is properly looked after when you can’t be there.

Spending time with and caring for animals is our livelihood, so with Furry Friends Pet Services you can be sure that your pet is being loved and cared for as if he/she were our own.

Sam and Billie are both CRB (police) checked and in previous careers have worked extensively with children and vulnerable adults.

We have 40 combined years’ experience of handling and living with dogs and other pets. We are qualified dog trainers and behaviourists through the Institute of Modern Dog Trainers and provide ethical, modern, reward-based training and control methods.

We are fully insured and animal first aid trained in case of an emergency involving your pet. We drive professionally customised, air conditioned dog and pet-carrying vans for your pet’s safety and comfort.

Ideal Networks is an independently owned, rapidly growing network infrastructure company based in Brighton.

We provide cutting edge Cisco technologies to a host of household name customers.

Our Customer Collaboration Centre is designed to help customers identify challenges, find solutions and embrace the opportunities generated by the new world of unified communication. Through the interactive demonstration of our collaboration solutions customers can experience for themselves how Cisco voice and video technologies can transform how they do business. 

Ideal Networks is a certified ATP - Cisco TelePresence Video Advanced Partner. We are one of the UK's leading companies providing high quality video conferencing solutions. Customers can also use our state of the art video conferencing suite at our Brighton HQ. 

Our borderless network experts help organisations get the most from their IT infrastructure and can design BYOD solutions to ensure customers can securely allow their employees to bring their own devices to work, increasing productivity and employee happiness.

From new solutions, to professional & technical services and maintenance & support, we work hard to bespoke solutions to help our customers make their working environment more efficient, flexible, secure and reliable.
values.name: Ideal Networks Ltd
Smart Training and Recruitment
values.description:
Welcome to Smart Training and Recruitment Limited – a National Training Company with training centre’s established in, Leeds, Manchester, Birmingham, Winchester, the Isle of Wight, Brighton, Bournemouth and Bath.
The company was established in 2003 on the Isle of Wight delivering Apprenticeship programmes mainly in the Hospitality Sector.  Since then it has expanded across the country in terms of geographical areas and is now delivering in the following sectors:
•         Hospitality and Catering              
•         Business Administration
•         Customer Service
•         Cleaning and Support
•         Sales
•         Retail
•         I.T.
In addition to Apprenticeships we also have a Foundation Learning Programme – with highly equipped and resourced Training Centre’s in Brighton and the Isle of Wight.  The company currently employs over 150 employees working with 2500 learners within an employer base of over 750.
Our Mission Statement “Working Together To Enrich Life” is at the heart of all that we do to ensure that our learners, employers and staff fulfill their aims, aspirations and career ambitions. Smart Training and Recruitment is committed to equality of opportunity and treatment, both as a provider of training and as an employer.  The company is committed to the production, implementation, review and monitoring of policies for all those who train and work within the organisation. 
Smart Training and Recruitment works in partnership with E.D.I. – City and Guilds, N.C.F.E., B.I.I. awarding organisations who assist us with ensuring that our training provision is fit for purpose, of the highest quality and is learner focused, to ensure that our learners enjoy and achieve an enriching learning activity that meets the business needs of our employers and aspirations of our learners.

The Kitchen Store is a designer and installer of beautiful kitchens throughout Sussex.. We have two flagship showrooms one in Brighton & Hove and the other at our manufacturing plant in Lancing, Sussex.

Established in 2004, we are UK retail Distributor for Manhattan Furniture and Paula Rosa kitchens supplying customers throughout the South and nationwide.

As experts in the Manhattan and Paula Rosa current and back catalogues, we also sell furniture parts, accessories and appliances to existing kitchen owners throughout the UK who wish to add, extend, upgrade or renew their existing kitchens.

In 2013 we were proud to be Finalists in the Brighton and Hove Business Awards

*Best Customer Service
*Best Independent Retailer
*Managing Director of the Year
values.name: The Kitchen Store (Retail) Ltd.
